data.title: Casema Replaces Modems Struck by Lightning
data.meta_description: According to a spokesperson from Casema, lightning can damage modems via the cable or via the regular electrical network. Since Casema rents out modems to its customers, they are replacing them free of charge. Casema recommends that you disconnect your modem and other electrical appliances during bad weather and when leaving on holidays.
data.text:
According to a spokesperson from Casema, lightning can damage modems via the cable or via the regular electrical network. Since Casema rents out modems to its customers, they are replacing them free of charge.

Casema recommends that you disconnect your modem and other electrical appliances during bad weather and when leaving on holidays.
